Title: Woodside, BHP approve Scarborough, Pluto Train 2 projects
Description: Australian independent Woodside and UK-Australian resources firm BHP have taken final investment decisions (FID) to approve the Scarborough and Pluto Train 2 projects in Western Australia, with the decision coming a week after Woodsideâ€™s move to sell a 49% stake in Pluto Train 2.
